name: Collision Course (itch) (Zakroutil)
description:
This game was created for 2019 Epic MegaJam.

Have you ever wandered, what would it feel like to be a huge asteroid with power to destroy everything you want? Well Collision Course gives you the opportunity to try exactly that!

Use your immense destructive power to do as much damage as possible and try to find special structures on the planet and the Moon to unlock special abilities, that will help you to cause even more damage!

If you like Collision Course please consider supporting us!

Controls:

Mouse - Movement

LMB - Activate Special Ability

(If the game doesn't load correctly press the "Reset All Progress" Button)
